TypeSignature.Value: public class Atom10ItemFormatter<TSyndicationItem> : System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter where TSyndicationItem : SyndicationItemnew()

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Atom10ItemFormatter`1<.ctor (class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem) TSyndicationItem> extends System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter

Docs.summary: A class that serializes -derived classes to and from Atom 1.0 format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>-derived classes and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived classes from XML documents that contain Atom1.0 entries. If you must serialize a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter> formatter instead.
> [!NOTE] > The Atom 1.0 specification allows for fractional seconds to be specified in any of its date constructs. When serializing and deserializing, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/indigo2-md.md)] implementation ignores the fractional seconds.
## Examples The following code demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>-derived class and serialize it to Atom 1.0.
[!code-vb[AtomFormatter#9](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.sy_11_1.vb)] [!code-cs[AtomFormatter#9](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.sy_11_1.cs)]
